metadata.Title: CVE-2007-1825

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP3

metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in the imap_mail_compose function in PHP 5 before 5.2.1, and PHP 4 before 4.4.5, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long boundary string in a type.parameters field. NOTE: as of 20070411, it appears that this issue might be subsumed by CVE-2007-0906.3.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP3 is installed
